Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Yes, Milyn Faram sent me a messenger who spoke highly of you.
Perhaps the Hlaalu will not be so hasty to oppose us next time.
Why not take this book? It shows one of the many uses of illusions.
I have also been researching how to make a Staff of Hunger. It is not quite perfected, but perhaps you could find some use for it.
You dealt with the problems in Odirniran.
It is so much happier here now that the meddling Hlaalu are gone.
Now, go away, I have work to do.
Remasa Othril and her meddling Hlaalu are gone, yes, but you also let her sister, Vedelea Othril, get away!
I was... saving her for an experiment of mine and now you've ruined it.
Report back to Aryon that I am well. And don't come here every again.
Yes, you convinced the Hlaalu in Odirniran to leave Milyn Faram alone.  Good work, outlander.
You've been expelled. I cannot discuss business with you unless you make amends.
Go to Odirniran, on Azura's coast, west of the shrine to Azura and south of the old Dwemer ruins of Nchurdamz.
I will mark these ruins on your map.
If there are any survivors, ask them what needs to be done.
If there are no survivors, take revenge on the foul Telvanni there.
You've already killed the Necromancer in Odirniran?
Good work. Take these 500 drakes for anticipating my needs so well.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
SetStage fbmwHHOdirniran 100
Player.AddItem Gold001 500
ModDisposition player 15

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: I'm glad to hear that the Telvanni threat in Odirniran has ended. Please take these 500 drakes for a job well done.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
SetStage fbmwHHOdirniran 100
Player.AddItem Gold001 500
ModDisposition player 15

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: You killed the Telvanni and you rescued Vedelea Othril? This was a great service to House Hlaalu.
Please take these 1000 drakes for a job well done.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
SetStage fbmwHHOdirniran 100
Set fbmwHHAdvancement.HlaaluReputation TO fbmwHHAdvancement.HlaaluReputation + 5
Player.AddItem Gold001 1000
ModDisposition player 20

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: There is no more Telvanni threat in Odirniran.
I cannot discuss Odirniran with non-Hlaalu members.
Yes, we've had trouble with a Telvanni necromancer.
He's still somewhere in Odirniran, and he's taken my sister hostage.
We are still recovering from our last assault, but most of his minions are dead.
Kill the necromancer and rescue my sister, Vedelea Othril.
Please hurry, outlander. Who knows what he's doing to her?
Vedelea is safe! Thank you, outlander, but someone will still need to take care of the Telvanni necromancer.
You killed Milyn Faram and found Vedelea! Thank you, outlander.
We can take care of anything else left here in Odirniran.
You've already helped us, outlander. You should report back to Edryno Arethi.
The fight here went badly for us. Take me back to me sister, Remasa Othril, if you can.
I am sorry to hear about my sister. I should have expected this. Still, the necromancer is dead, and she died for a good cause.
Yes, this is Odirniran. We've been having trouble with a Telvanni necromancer and one of our party was captured.
Speak with our leader, Remasa Othril.
Is Remasa Othril is dead, yes, but you also killed her sister, Vedelea Othril.
I was... saving her for an experiment of mine and now you've ruined it.
Report back to Aryon that I am well. And don't come here every again.
Is Remasa Othril dead? She is? Excellent. I can get on with my experiments.
Since you helped me with these meddling Hlaalu, I might be persuaded to share the results of my research.
Yes, Odirniran is my home. If you wish to help me, please get rid of Remasa Othril, the leader of these Hlaalu who pester me.
Feel free to kill my servants. I can usually raise them again.
Also, please leave Vedelea Othril to me. I do not want her damaged or altered in any way... At least not by you.
Odirniran is mine. You shall not take it from me.
Yes, the leader of the Hlaalu in Odirniran has been retired... It is unfortunate that Milyn Faram is also dead.
His research was unusual, but promising.
Yes, the leader of the Hlaalu in Odirniran has been retired... Perhaps they will not be so hasty to oppose us next time.
It is on Azura's coast, west of the shrine to Azura and south of the old Dwemer ruins of Nchurdamz. I will mark these ruins on your map.
Go there and speak with Milyn Faram who is under attack by forces of House Hlaalu. He is probably making his last stand at the top of his tower.
You killed the necromancer, but where is Vedelea? Is she okay? Escort her back to me if you find her.
